name: Public Organization "ALLIANCE.GLOBAL"
goal: Public Organization "ALLIANCE.GLOBAL" (earlier: NGO "GAY-ALLIANCE") is working in the area of HIV, STIs and viral hepatitis (prevention, support, advocacy) among the most vulnerable groups MSM, IDUs, sex workers, former prisoners in Ukraine and community mobilization.
euInitiatives:
We are planning to work with organizations from the European Union.
Our organization application process for entry to the HIV/AIDS Civil Society Forum at the European Commission (https://ec.europa.eu/health/sti_prevention/hiv_aids/civil_society_forum_en), by members of which may be NGOs from Europe are not from European Union.
